product_name: KAVU For Keeps Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: You'll be surprised how much you can stuff into the women's KAVU For Keeps Shoulder Bag, with its 4 compartments and front billow pocket. Adjustable strap lets you carry cross-body or over your shoulder. Snap-closed main compartment and zippered front pocket secure your daily essentials; key clip keeps your keys handy. 4 individual compartments and wide-opening front "billow" pocket let you stow everything from your phone to lunch to an e-reader. KAVU For Keeps Shoulder Bag comes in eye-catching patterns and color combos.
short_description: You'll be surprised how much you can stuff into the women's KAVU For Keeps Shoulder Bag, with its 4 compartments and front billow pocket.
